wikipedia_page.main: Joanna Ravenscroft Spicer CBE born Joanna Gibbon (29 April 1906 – 17 March 1992) was a British television executive employed by the BBC. Described by the Oxford Dictionary of National Biography as "virtually unknown", she was involved with discussions leading to Doctor Who and Civilisation. It was said that she "ran BBC Television single handed."
